name: Brave Battle Saga - The Legend of The Magic Warrior
description: Brave Battle Saga - The Legend of the Magic Warrior is a Sega Genesis game that came out only in Taiwanese markets. It has been fully translated to English. The Game features great battle system, party system, spells, summons, and a turn based fighting engine. Enjoy over 40 hours of gameplay for only $4.99!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4, Athlon 64 or later Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
